name: Fist Bump
description:
This game was made for the GeoJam (https://itch.io/jam/geojam).

In this puzzle platformer, help the square and circle unite, so that they can fist bump!

I'm pretty new to level design, so excuse any poorly designed levels.

Special thanks to TheLine for making the music!

https://soundcloud.com/liningend-729

The music was made before the jam. Originally, he was going to make something new, but I remembered that he made this song and I thought it fit perfectly, so I asked if I could use it instead.

Feel free to leave your best time in the comments!

Stuck? Solutions here:
